detail-doctor.validation-description: Please take these instructions into account to confirm your appointment: General medicine consultation
detail-doctor.validation-indice: If you are sick (cold, fever, cough), please wear a mask in the waiting room and during consultation.

confirm-pay.req-description: Are you sure you want to validate this payment request?

confirm-rdv-patient.title: Appointment confirmation
